decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 03 - 23646_P_003_02-46 Existing Floor Plans and Elevations; 03 - 23646_P_004_02-46 Proposed Floor Plans and Elevations
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be identical to what stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Addition of an external wall insulation to the elevation to the property at the cladded areas. Installing the External Wall insulation up to the Party Wall in some areas, adding the necessary finish that will be a rendered finish (Colour: to match/contrast with existing being a white) & Existing roof to be removed and replaced with warm roof system with GRP or similar finish, raising the existing roof ridge & reducing the high level window, & New external windows and doors with like for like materials (to match existing).
